speaker.whotheyare: Maria Gallucci writes about the latest advances in clean energy technology.
speaker.whylisten: Maria Gallucci is a clean energy reporter for Canary Media based in New York City. She has reported across the United States and Latin America on energy technology, policy and the effects of climate change. Her work has brought her aboard cargo ships, inside power plants and within communities recovering from disasters and developing sustainable, resilient solutions. Gallucci was the 2017-18 Energy Journalism Fellow at the University of Texas in Austin, where she wrote about efforts to decarbonize the global shipping industry. Prior to joining Canary, she was a contributing writer for Grist and IEEE Spectrum, and was previously a staff reporter for InsideClimate News, Mashable, and Mexico City newspapers.
